data.title: BK Magazine Online
data.meta_description: Bangkok's best events, restaurants, nightlife, bars, shopping and travel deals. Daily news on new places, films, concerts, DJ gigs, parties and more.
data.text:
BK's big list of Bangkok's 42 best rooftop bars

New spots, old favorites, and the very best places to tie one on in the sky, complete with the BAD Awards 2024 winners and finalists.

4 months ago

Bangkok's 50 best cafes and restaurants to get breakfast

Our big breakfast list is back for 2023! Shumai, sweets, coffee, dosa, sandos, bagels—up and at ‘em, Bangkok.

8 months ago

The 16 best vegetarian restaurants in Bangkok

Deeply satisfying plant-based places you need to know.

3 years ago

Taste test: who makes Bangkok’s best shawarma?

Wrap it up.

3 years ago

Bangkok's best co-working spaces and shared offices

Cool flexible work spaces that go beyond cafes.

3 years ago

Who makes the best donuts in Bangkok?

Donut worry, be happy.

3 years ago

The 8 best cafes in Ari

This Bangkok neighborhood is the ultimate slow-life destination.

4 years ago

The 9 best cafes in Phrom Phong in 2020

Take this list as a starting point for exploring a neighborhood that has embraced brunch culture like no other. Order up a flat white and enjoy!

4 years ago

The best cafes in Silom and Sathorn to try now

Breakfast and coffee have never been better in the CBD.

4 years ago
